column4: okay, got 10.04. want to change login screen around, but i can't unlock the login screen settings. it asks for root password?
root password is the same one you used at install. Same one you use for everything that needs the elevated privileges.
no, it doesn't ask for my password, but root's specifically. i sudoed it and it still didn't work
Thats because there is no default root account or password enabled.
